snippet: In his return to the Giants, Brandon Jacobs added to his franchise-record touchdown total. But he gained only 4 yards in his seven carries, a performance that underscored the team’s rushing woes.
lead_paragraph: In his return to the Giants, Brandon Jacobs added to his franchise-record touchdown total. But he gained only 4 yards in his seven carries, a performance that underscored the team’s rushing woes.

headline.main: Jacobs Gets Into End Zone, but Giants’ Running Game Goes Nowhere
headline.print_headline: Jacobs Gets Into End Zone, but Giants’ Running Game Goes Nowhere
